PAD_TeacherGrave.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on her former teacher's grave.

PAD_TeacherGraveFlower.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on the flower offering.
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower.how_to_trigger: 1.Offer flower on grave at 24; 41; 13 while shadowheart is there

PAD_TeacherGrave_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGrave_0.text: This man served Lady Shar in secret, and taught me his skills. He is in her embrace now.

PAD_TeacherGrave_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGrave_1.text: Odd... I feel a touch of loss at this grave. Grief, even. But who is this?
PAD_TeacherGrave_1.context: NodeContext: Confused. Feeling sorrow over a stranger's tombstone (she has a past connection that she has forgotten - an instructor in Sharran tradecraft that died incognito)

PAD_TeacherGrave_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGrave_2.text: Odd... I can't help but feel a twinge of sorrow at this grave. But why? Who is this?
PAD_TeacherGrave_2.context: NodeContext: Confused. Feeling sorrow over a stranger's tombstone (she has a past connection that she has forgotten - an instructor in Sharran tradecraft that died incognito)

AD_TeacherGrave_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_TeacherGrave_0.text: *Here rests Allister Marnley, taken too soon.*

PAD_Graffiti_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Graffiti_0.text: The follies of youth. I have no need to daub walls in other to be remembered now.

PAD_Graffiti_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Graffiti_1.text: That graffiti... it almost looks like it was done in my hand. Did I do this?
PAD_Graffiti_1.context: NodeContext: Confused/realisation. Seeing graffiti that she realises may be her handiwork

PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_0.text: A small remembrance... from one who can scarcely remember. Rest well.
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_0.context: NodeContext: Brief dedication upon offering a flower to the grave of someone she feels sorrow for, but doesn't quite remember.

PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_1.text: My favourite flower. Just a small remembrance... from one who can scarcely remember. Rest well.
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_1.context: NodeContext: Brief dedication upon offering a flower (her favourite kind)  to the grave of someone she feels sorrow for, but doesn't quite remember.

PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_2.text: My favourite. A kind touch, thank you.
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_2.context: NodeContext: Appreciative. Player laid a flower on the grave of a stranger that SH feels inexplicably mournful for. It's her favourite type of flower, also.

PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_3.text: A kind touch. The dead may not care, but thank you all the same.
PAD_TeacherGraveFlower_3.context: NodeContext: Appreciative. Player laid a flower on the grave of a stranger that SH feels inexplicably mournful for
